name: Brough-Like Turbrough
description:
Brough-Like Turbrough

A game made for the Fantasy Console Game Jam 3.  The game is an attempt to combine and experiment with the concepts in a few of the wonderful roguelikes by the talented Michael Brough.  It is particularly inspired by the item identification elements in Cinco Paus and the tile based spells in Imbroglio.  The game also incorporates a speed element as part of the game jam's 'Minute' theme.
